installation.title: Installation
pars: Creating a Whistlepost site requires a basic directory structure as follows:

• src/
    • app/ # page templates
    • assets/ # static resource files (e.g. css, images, javascript)
    • config/ # Apache Sling configuration
    • content/ # site content
  • app.bnd # App bundle definition
  • build.gradle # Gradle build configuration
  • config.bnd # Configuration bundle definition
  • content.bnd # Content bundle definition
  • docker-compose.yml # Docker configuration for local testing
